name: Moero Chronicle Deluxe Bundle
description:
Get the whole package with the Deluxe Bundle!

Includes:
  • Moero Chronicle game
  • Monster Girls Gallery Art Book - 53 pages of moe monster girls and all their costumes!
  • (x3) PC wallpaper - Moe up your PC with these three wallpapers!
  • (x3) Phone wallpaper - Bring your favorite monster girls with you with one of these phone wallpapers!
